{{pp-pc1}} {{Use dmy dates|date=March 2016}} {{Infobox model |name = Gisele Bündchen |image = Gisele Bundchen-012 (16251942066).jpg |caption = Bündchen in January 2015 |birth_name = Gisele Caroline Bündchen |birth_date = {{Birth date and age|df=yes|1980|7|20}} |birth_place = [[Horizontina]] or [[Três de Maio]], [[Rio Grande do Sul]], [[Brazil]] |occupation={{flatlist| * Model }} |years_active = 1997–present |haircolor = {{flatlist| *Light brownPer "Stats" pulldown at {{cite web|title= Gisele| url=http://imgmodels.com/portfolio/new-york/women/model?mid=21993|publisher=[[IMG Models]]|accessdate=2 August 2017}}}} |eyecolor = {{flatlist| *Blue}} |height = {{convert|1.80|m|ftin|abbr=on}} |agency = [[IMG Models]] (Worldwide){{cite web|url=http://www.imgmodels.com/gisele/sydney/women/portfolio|title=Gisele: IMG Models|website=Imgmodels.com|accessdate=27 January 2018}}
Model Management (Hamburg) {{cite web|url=https://models.com/models/Gisele-Bundchen|title=Gisele Bündchen - Model|website=Models.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} |website = {{url|http://www.giselebundchen.com}} |spouse = {{Marriage|[[Tom Brady]]|2009}} |children = 2, and one stepchild }} '''Gisele Caroline Bündchen'''{{cite web|url=http://www.giselebundchen.com.br/gisele_perfil.asp?ididioma=2 |title=In Childhood|website=Giselebundchen.com.br|accessdate=3 June 2011 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110706152608/http://www.giselebundchen.com.br/gisele_perfil.asp?ididioma=2 |archivedate=6 July 2011 }} ({{IPAc-en|ɡ|i|ˈ|z|ɛ|l|i|_|ˈ|b|ʌ|n|d|h|ə|n}}; {{IPA-pt|ʒiˈzɛli ˈbĩtʃẽj|lang}}, {{IPA-de|ɡiˈzɛlə ˈbʏntçn̩|lang}}; born 20 July 1980){{Cite news|title=Gisele Bündchen: "Brazil Should Become World Champion" |url=http://www.dw-world.de/dw/article/0,,2029705,00.html |publisher=[[Deutsche Welle]] |date=27 May 2006 |accessdate=3 March 2011 |quote=Gisele Bündchen was born – together with her twin sister Patricia – on 20 July 1980 in Brazil |archivedate=29 May 2006 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20060529012721/http://www.dw-world.de/dw/article/0%2C%2C2029705%2C00.html |deadurl=no |df= }} is a Brazilian [[Model (person)|model]] and actress. Since 2004, Bündchen has been among the highest-paid models in the world, and as of 2007 was the 16th richest woman in the entertainment industry.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/2007/01/17/richest-women-entertainment-tech-media-cz_lg_richwomen07_0118womenstars_lander.html |title=The 20 Richest Women In Entertainment |work=Forbes |date=18 January 2007 |accessdate=3 June 2011 |first1=Lea |last1=Goldman |first2=Kiri |last2=Blakeley}} In 2012, she placed first on the ''[[Forbes]]'' top-earning models list.{{cite news |first= Brian |last=Solomon |title=The World's Highest Paid Models |url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/briansolomon/2012/06/14/the-worlds-highest-paid-models/|website=Forbes.com|date=14 June 2012 |accessdate=20 June 2012}} In 2014, she was listed as the 89th Most Powerful Woman in the World by ''Forbes''. In the late 1990s, Bündchen was the first in a wave of Brazilian models to find international success.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/2007/07/19/models-media-bundchen-biz-media-cz_kb_0716topmodels.html |title=The World's Top-Earning Models|work=Forbes Magazine |date=19 July 2007 |accessdate=3 June 2011 |first=Kiri |last=Blakeley}} In 1999, ''[[Vogue (magazine)|Vogue]]'' noted "The Return of the Sexy Model", and she was credited with ending the "[[heroin chic]]" era of modeling.{{Cite news|url=http://www.vogue.it/en/magazine/editor-s-blog/2014/08/august-8th|title=Gisele Bundchen - Vogue.it|access-date=2018-03-28|language=it}} Bündchen was one of the [[Victoria's Secret#Victoria's Secret Angels|Victoria's Secret Angels]] from 2000 until mid-2007. Bündchen pioneered the "horse walk", a stomping movement created when a model picks her knees up high and kicks her feet out in front.{{cite news |url=https://www.wsj.com/public/article/SB120597258876350391.html?mod=2_1356_topbox |title=How to Walk Like a Model |last=O'Connell |first=Vanessa |date=20 March 2008 |work=The Wall Street Journal |publisher=Dow Jones & Company, Inc |accessdate=20 February 2011}} In a 2007 ''Vogue'' interview, [[Claudia Schiffer]] stated that Bündchen is the only remaining [[supermodel]].{{cite web|url=http://www.vogue.co.uk/news/daily/2007-09/070904-death-of-the-supermodel.aspx |title="Supermodels like we once were don't exist any more" - Claudia Schiffer gets nostalgic |website=Vogue.co.uk |date=4 September 2007 |accessdate=11 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110611160522/http://www.vogue.co.uk/news/daily/2007-09/070904-death-of-the-supermodel.aspx |archivedate=11 June 2011 |df=dmy }} Bündchen ventured into acting when she played a supporting role in ''[[Taxi (2004 film)|Taxi]]'' (2004), for which she was nominated at the [[Teen Choice Awards]] for Choice Movie Breakout Performance, and for Choice Movie Bad Guy. Bündchen had a supporting role in ''[[The Devil Wears Prada (film)|The Devil Wears Prada]]'' (2006), and from 2010 to 2011, she was the executive producer of an educational environmental cartoon, ''Gisele & the Green Team''. Bündchen married [[New England Patriots]] quarterback [[Tom Brady]] in 2009. She supports many charities including [[Save the Children]], [[International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement|Red Cross]] and [[Médecins Sans Frontières|Doctors Without Borders]], as well as dedicating time to environmental causes. She is the [[Goodwill Ambassador]] for the [[United Nations Environment Programme]].{{cite news |url=http://www.boston.com/ae/celebrity/articles/2009/09/21/bundchen_the_environmentalist/ |work=Boston Globe |title=Bundchen the environmentalist |date=21 September 2009 |first1=Mark |last1=Shanahan |first2=Meredith |last2=Goldstein}} ==Family and early life== Bündchen is a sixth-generation [[German Brazilians|Brazilian of German descent]],{{cite web | title=Gisele Bündchen: "Brazil Should Become World Champion" | work=Carlos Albuquerque | url=http://www.dw-world.de/dw/article/0,2144,2029705,00.html | accessdate=23 January 2008}} born and raised in [[Horizontina]] or in [[Três de Maio]], [[Rio Grande do Sul]], [[Southern Brazil]],{{cite web|url=http://www.giselebundchen.com.br/gisele_carreira_capas.asp?iddioma2 |title="Career", from her official site |website=Giselebundchen.com.br |accessdate=12 April 2017 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120313052807/http://www.giselebundchen.com.br/gisele_carreira_capas.asp?iddioma2 |archivedate=13 March 2012 |df= }} to Vânia Nonnenmacher, a bank clerk pensioner, and Valdir Bündchen, a college professor and writer, both of German extraction.{{cite web|last=Bennetts |first=Leslie |url=http://www.vanityfair.com/style/features/2009/05/gisele-bundchen200905 |title=And God Created Gisele |work=Vanity Fair |accessdate=22 November 2012}} She grew up with five sisters—Raquel, Graziela, Gabriela, Rafaela and her [[Twin#Dizygotic twins|fraternal twin]], Patrícia, her junior by five minutes.{{cite web|url=http://chicago.metromix.com/home/photogallery/top-10-celebrities-with/966649/content |title="Top 10 Celebrities with twins" at Metromix |website=Chicago.metromix.com |accessdate=3 June 2011 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20100327053216/http://chicago.metromix.com/home/photogallery/top-10-celebrities-with/966649/content |archivedate=27 March 2010 |df= }} In addition to Portuguese, Gisele speaks English, Italian, Spanish and some French,{{cite web|url=https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/fashion/features/gisele-b-ndchen-business-model-it-takes-more-than-just-good-looks-to-get-to-the-top-8782676.html|title=Gisele Bündchen: Business model - it takes more than just good looks|date=23 August 2013|website=Independent.co.uk|accessdate=8 January 2018}} and learned German at school, but has stated that: "....being out of touch with the language for such a long time, I unfortunately forgot it." In 1993, Bündchen joined a modeling course with her sisters Patrícia and Gabriela at their mother's insistence. The following year, Bündchen was discovered by the [[Elite Model Management|Elite]] modeling agency at a shopping mall in [[São Paulo]] while on a school excursion. She was subsequently selected for a national contest, Elite Look of the Year,[http://www.elitemodellook.com/successstories/giselebndchen.html "Success Stories GISELE BÜNDCHEN"] Elite Model Look in which she placed second. Bündchen placed fourth in the [[Elite Model Look]] world contest in [[Ibiza]], [[Spain]]. At 14, Bündchen moved to São Paulo to launch her modeling career. In 1996, Bündchen had her first New York City break at [[New York Fashion Week|Fashion Week]].{{cite web |last=Sullivan |first=Robert |url=http://www.vogue.com/voguepedia/Gisele_Bundchen#cite_note-3 |title=Profile |website=Vogue.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140331204652/http://www.vogue.com/voguepedia/Gisele_Bundchen#cite_note-3 |archive-date=31 March 2014 |dead-url=yes |df=dmy-all }} ==Career== ===1997–2000: Career beginnings=== Bündchen travelled to London in 1997, where she auditioned for 42 shows. She got her big break when chosen for her ability to walk in towering heels on a slippery runway for [[Alexander McQueen]]'s spring 1998 "rain" ready-to-wear show. Echoing similar accolades for [[Elle Macpherson]] a decade earlier, McQueen dubbed Bündchen "the Body", immediately boosting her bookings.{{Dead link|date=May 2017}} In 1998, she posed for Missoni, Chloé, Dolce & Gabbana, Valentino, Gianfranco Ferré, Ralph Lauren, and Versace campaigns. She made the cover of the French edition of ''[[Vogue Paris|Vogue]]'', and fashion magazine ''[[i-D]]'' featured her on its cover, profiling "A Girl Called Gisele." The ''Vogue'' online encyclopedia of models states, "As the year 2000 approached, Gisele Bündchen was the world's hottest model, opening up a new category in the popular imagination: the Brazilian bombshell." She appeared on the cover of ''Vogue'' in July, November and December 1999. She won the [[VH1]]/''Vogue'' Model of the Year for 1999, and a January 2000 cover gave her three consecutive ''Vogue'' covers. In 2000, she became the fourth model to appear on the cover of the music magazine ''[[Rolling Stone]]'' when she was named "The Most Beautiful Girl in the World".{{cite web|title=The Most Beautiful Girl|url=http://www.pophistorydig.com/?tag=rolling-stone-magazine|accessdate=20 September 2012}} Bündchen has appeared on the covers of many top fashion magazines, including ''[[W (magazine)|W]]'', ''[[Harper's Bazaar]]'', ''[[Elle (magazine)|Elle]]'', ''[[Allure (magazine)|Allure]]'', as well as style and lifestyle publications such as ''[[The Face (magazine)|The Face]]'', ''[[Arena (magazine)|Arena]]'', ''Citizen K'', ''Flair'', ''[[GQ]]'', ''[[Esquire (magazine)|Esquire]]'', and ''[[Marie Claire]],'' and in the ''[[Pirelli Calendar]] in 2001 and 2006.''{{cite web|url=http://www.fashionmodeldirectory.com/models/Gisele_Bundchen |title=Gisele Bündchen profile |publisher=Fashionmodeldirectory.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013}} She has also been seen in ''TIME'', ''[[Vanity Fair (magazine)|Vanity Fair]]'', ''[[Forbes]]'', ''[[Newsweek]]'', and ''[[Veja (magazine)|Veja]]''. Bündchen has appeared on more than 1,200 magazine covers throughout the world.{{cite web|url=http://www.giselebundchen.com.br/gisele_carreira_capas.asp?iddioma2 |title="Career", from her official site |publisher=Giselebundchen.com.br |accessdate=3 June 2011 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110706152612/http://www.giselebundchen.com.br/gisele_carreira_capas.asp?iddioma2 |archivedate=6 July 2011 |df= }}{{Self-published inline|date=May 2017}} She simultaneously featured on the covers of both the US and British editions of ''Vogue'' in January 2000. {{quote|Take the case of 18-year-old Gisele Bundchen, a.k.a. Gisele, fashion’s new über- (not super-) model. Gisele is currently shooting five massive advertising campaigns, starring on the cover of W, and playing the muse to t/bersnappers Steven Meisel and Mario Testino. In short, Gisele is huge.Sally Singer. ''Fashion Moment, Gisele Bündchen''. New York Magazine Company. 1999, 43-45 p.|Sally Singer, New York Magazine editor (1999)}} ===2000–2009: Modeling breakthrough and acting debut=== [[File:GiseleBundchen.jpg|thumb|upright=0.75|Bündchen in 2006]] Bündchen appeared on the book covers of ''Mario de Janeiro'' by [[Mario Testino]]{{cite web|url=http://www.mariotestino.com/page/610 |title=Mario de Janeiro |publisher=MarioTestino.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120415064511/http://www.mariotestino.com/page/610 |archivedate=15 April 2012 |df= }} and a Russell James retrospective.{{cite web |url=http://www.studiorusselljames.com/main.html#/retrospective-book//view-selection// |title=Russell James Retrospective Book |publisher=Studiorusselljames.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20121222033231/http://www.studiorusselljames.com/main.html#/retrospective-book//view-selection// |archivedate=22 December 2012 |df=dmy-all }} Also that year ''Time'' said she was "one of the few runway models whom straight men can name".{{cite web|title=Gisele Bündchen|url=http://www.people.com/people/gisele_bundchen/biography|work=PEOPLE.com|accessdate=29 March 2015|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140710172826/http://www.people.com/people/gisele_bundchen/biography|archivedate=10 July 2014|df=dmy-all}} For spring 2000 fashion week she opened [[Marc Jacobs]], Michael Kors, Dolce & Gabbana, Christian Dior, and Valentino shows in New York, Milan and Paris.{{cite web|url=http://nymag.com/fashion/models/gbundchen/giselebundchen/|title=Gisele Bundchen – Model Profile | accessdate =1 September 2011}} From 1998–2003, Bündchen was in every Dolce & Gabbana fashion campaign, totaling 11 consecutive campaigns with the brand{{citation needed|date=April 2017}}. In 2006–2009, she returned as the face of the brand's fragrance, in a campaign titled "Dolce & Gabbana The One".{{cite web|url=http://www.giselebundchen.com/gisele_carreira_campanhas.asp |title=Gisele Bündchen – Campaigns |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110819090658/http://www.giselebundchen.com/gisele_carreira_campanhas.asp |archivedate=19 August 2011 |df= }} In 2000, Bündchen wore the most expensive Victoria's Secret Fantasy bra of all time, the "Red Hot Fantasy Bra", worth $15 million and listed in ''Guinness World Records'' as the most expensive lingerie ever created.{{cite web |url=http://www.fashion.ie/Articles/VICTORIA%27S-SECRET-FANTASY-BRA-COMES-TO-LONDON/1930 |title=Victoria's Secret Fantasy Bra Comes to London |publisher=Fashion.ie |date=14 January 2013 |accessdate=19 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140903212645/http://www.fashion.ie/Articles/VICTORIA%27S-SECRET-FANTASY-BRA-COMES-TO-LONDON/1930 |archivedate=3 September 2014 |df=dmy-all }} In February 2001, her [[Got Milk?]] ad campaign debuted in the 2001 ''[[Sports Illustrated]] [[Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue|Swimsuit Issue]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.thefreelibrary.com/Ubermodel+Gisele+Hits+the+Beach+Wearing+a+Towel+and+Milk+Mustache%3B...-a070432856 |title=Ubermodel Gisele Hits the Beach Wearing a Towel and Milk Mustache; Latest Milk Mustache Ad to Debut in 2001 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue|publisher=Thefreelibrary.com |date=13 February 2001 |accessdate=24 December 2012}} Photographed by [[Steven Meisel]], she was presented on the September 2004 cover of American ''Vogue'' as one of the "Models of the Moment".September 2004 American Vogue In 2004, Bündchen co-starred with [[Queen Latifah]] and [[Jimmy Fallon]] in the 2004 remake of ''[[Taxi (2004 film)|Taxi]]''. In 2005, she was chosen to wear the Victoria's Secret Fantasy Bra again, the Sexy Splendor Fantasy Bra. At the time, it was the second-most expensive bra ever made, valued at $12.5 million.{{cite web|title=Victoria's Secret Fantasy Bra Collection|url=http://www.missosology.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=108652|publisher=Missosology|date= |accessdate=19 January 2013}} In its December 2005 issue, ''[[New York (magazine)|New York]]'' magazine list Bundchen as No. 43 in its list of 123 reasons to love New York City.{{cite web|url=http://nymag.com/news/articles/reasonstoloveny/ |title=Reason to Love New York |work=New York Mag|accessdate=3 June 2011}} In 2006, she played Serena, a minor character in ''[[The Devil Wears Prada (film)|The Devil Wears Prada]]''.{{citation needed|date=May 2017}} In February 2007, Bündchen returned to the Milan runway by opening the Dolce & Gabbana's show. She was chosen by ''Time'' magazine in 2007 as one of the 100 Most Influential People in the World. In September 2007, Bündchen was featured on the cover of ''Vanity Fair''{{'}}s style issue, photographed by Mario Testino. The issue was one of the bestsellers that year. ===2009–2011: Continued success=== On 26 August 2008, the ''[[New York Daily News]]'' listed Bündchen as the fourth-most-powerful person in the fashion world.{{citation needed|date=May 2017}} On 12 May 2009, ''[[The Independent]]'' called her "the biggest star in fashion history".{{cite news |url=https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/fashion/features/gisele-bndchen-the-charmed-life-of-the-megamodel-1683088.html |work=The Independent |location=London |title=Gisele Bündchen: Charmed life of the mega-model |date=12 May 2009 |accessdate=3 May 2010 |quote=How did the girl from Brazil become the biggest star in fashion history?}} When she reappeared on the ''Vanity Fair'' cover in 2009, the issue was the lowest-selling for the magazine in nearly two years.{{cite web |url=http://skinnyvscurvy.com/page/8?cat=159 |title=Gisele Bündchen |publisher=Skinnyvscurvy.com |accessdate=22 November 2012}} In 2009 ''Harper's Bazaar'' rated her among the top 26 greatest models of all time.{{cite web |url=http://www.harpersbazaar.com/fashion/fashion-articles/famous-models-0409#slide-1 |title=Pictures of Famous Runway Models|accessdate=27 December 2012}} In December 2009 she appeared alongside her husband [[Tom Brady]] on the cover of book ''The World in Vogue—People, Parties, Places''.{{cite web|url=http://nymag.com/nymetro/shopping/fashion/columns/gothamstyle/1808/ |title=A twelve-step program for beauty junkies, and more |work=New York Magazine|date=17 January 2000 |accessdate=3 June 2011}} In 2010, she made ''Vogue''{{'}}s best-dressed-of-the-decade list for her 2008 and 2009 Met gala appearances, as well as for her bikini-clad, logo-tattooed appearance in a 2000 fashion editorial. In April 2010, she was photographed for the cover of American ''Vogue'' for the eleventh time. In September 2010, she led a group of top models for ''Vogue''{{'}}s Fashion's Night Out runway show at the [[Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts|Lincoln Center]] in New York. She then made a surprise appearance on Balenciaga's runway, closing the show. In 2011 she participated and represented [[Pantene]] in the Brazilian [[Rio Carnival]] 2011 parade.{{cite web |url=http://www.marieclaire.co.uk/celebrity/pictures/32510/28/rio-carnival-2011-rio-carnival-pictures-gisele-photos.html#index=9&uiSynced=true&slider=off |title=Rio Carnival pictures 2011; Gisele photos Celebrity Pictures |publisher=Marie Claire |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140104053222/http://www.marieclaire.co.uk/celebrity/pictures/32510/28/rio-carnival-2011-rio-carnival-pictures-gisele-photos.html#index=9&uiSynced=true&slider=off |archivedate=4 January 2014 |df=dmy-all }} She ranks first on models.com's the Money Girls list and second on The Sexiest Models list.{{cite web|url=http://models.com/rankings/money/|title=The Money Girls are Here}} In 2011 ''CEOWorld Magazine'' ranked her among their Top Accomplished Women Entertainers.{{Cite news|title=Accomplished Women Entertainers |url=http://ceoworld.biz/ceo/2011/05/18/ceoworld-richest-women-in-entertainment-world-list-accomplished-women-entertainers |newspaper=CEOWORLD magazine |date=18 May 2011 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160115070954/http://ceoworld.biz/ceo/2011/05/18/ceoworld-richest-women-in-entertainment-world-list-accomplished-women-entertainers |archivedate=15 January 2016 |df= }} She was ranked number 95 in ''[[FHM]]'' magazine's [[FHM's 100 Sexiest Women (UK)|100 Sexiest Women in the World 2011]].[http://www.fhm.com/girls/100-sexiest-women 100 Sexiest Women in the World 2011] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20111230000000/http://www.fhm.com/girls/100-sexiest-women |date=30 December 2011 }}, FHM magazine In 2007, Bündchen was named "The World's Richest Supermodel".{{cite web | url = http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20047102,00.html | title = Gisele Bundchen Named World's Richest Model | work = [[People (magazine)|People]] | accessdate =1 September 2011 }} On 11 April 2008, a black-and-white photo of Bündchen shot by [[Irving Penn]] was auctioned for $193,000 (£96,000). The picture was one of dozens from the collection of Gert Elfering that were sold at [[Christie's]] International in New York. Bündchen's picture sold for the highest price.{{cite news|url=http://www.boston.com/ae/celebrity/articles/2008/04/12/photo_of_gisele_brings_big_bucks/?p1=Well_MostPop_Emailed7 |title=Photo of Gisele brings big bucks|work=Boston Globe |date=12 April 2008 |accessdate=3 June 2011 |first1=Carol |last1=Beggy |first2=Mark |last2=Shanahan}}{{cite web|url=http://exclusivo.terra.com.br/interna/0,,OI2738910-EI1118,00.html |title="Foto de Gisele nua é comprada em leilão por US$193 mile", (Portuguese) xclusivo.terra.com.br |publisher=Exclusivo.terra.com.br |accessdate=3 June 2011}} As of 2010, Bündchen has appeared on two Vogue Shape issue covers, more than any other celebrity or model.{{cite web |url=http://www.vogue.com/vogue-daily/article/the-past-decade-of-shape-issues/#1 |title=Shaping a Decade: Ten Years of Vogue Shape Issue |accessdate=14 February 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130419050947/http://www.vogue.com/vogue-daily/article/the-past-decade-of-shape-issues/#1 |archivedate=19 April 2013 |df=dmy-all }} She ranked No. 45 in the 2011 FHM Australia list of "100 Sexiest Women in the World".{{cite web|url=http://www.fhm.com.au/fhms-100-sexiest-women-in-the-world-2011-gallery.htm |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20110513014056/http://www.fhm.com.au/fhms-100-sexiest-women-in-the-world-2011-gallery.htm |dead-url=yes |archive-date=13 May 2011 |title=FHM's 100 Sexiest Women in the World 2011 |accessdate=1 September 2011 }} In 2011, ''[[Men's Health (magazine)|Men's Health]]'' named her one of the "100 Hottest Women of All Time", ranking her at No. 25.{{cite web|title=The 100 Hottest Women of All-Time|url=http://www.menshealth.com/sex-women/hottest-women-all-time|work=[[Men's Health (magazine)|Men's Health]]|accessdate=3 January 2012|year=2011}} In October 2011, Bündchen made a surprise runway appearance during Paris Fashion Week, closing the Givenchy spring-summer 2012 fashion show.{{cite web |url=http://nymag.com/daily/fashion/2011/10/gisele_bundchen_closes_out_giv.html |title=Gisele Bündchen Closes Out Givenchy's All-Star Show – The Cut |publisher=Nymag.com |date=27 December 2012 |accessdate=7 January 2013}} In 2011, she participated and represented Pantene in the Brazilian Rio Carnival 2011 parade. In 2011, she appeared on eight ''Vogue'' covers, more than any other model or celebrity that year.{{cite web |url=http://fashionista.com/2011/12/this-year-in-vogue-the-covers/ |title=This Year in Vogue: An Analysis of all the Covers from 2011 – Fashionista: Fashion Industry News, Designers, Runway Shows, Style Advice |publisher=Fashionista.com |date=8 December 2011 |accessdate=22 January 2012}} Her July ''Vogue Brasil'' 2011 cover shot in the [[Amazon Rainforest|Amazon]] was the magazine's highest-selling issue ever, selling 70,743 copies. The record was later broken by model [[Karolína Kurková]], who appeared in the November 2011 issue, which sold 70,991 copies.[http://vogue.globo.com/mundo-vogue/a-vogue-brasileira-mais-vendida-de-todos-os-tempos/ "A Vogue brasileira mais vendida de todos os tempos"] 10 February 2012, Brazil Vogue (in Portuguese) {{webarchive |url=https://archive.is/20120718095012/http://vogue.globo.com/mundo-vogue/a-vogue-brasileira-mais-vendida-de-todos-os-tempos/ |date=18 July 2012 }} ===2012–present: Modelling campaigns and music endeavours=== In spring 2012 Bündchen won three major spring campaigns: Versace, Givenchy, and Salvatore Ferragamo.[http://fashion.elle.com/fashion/2011/12/22/the-year-of-gisele-and-lisbeth/ "The Year of Gisele and Lisbeth?"] 22 December 2011, Elle {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120504023508/http://fashion.elle.com/fashion/2011/12/22/the-year-of-gisele-and-lisbeth/ |date=4 May 2012 }} In early 2012, it was announced that she would be the face of Banco do Brasil's first global ad campaign, with the tagline "Bank of Brazil. From Brazil to the world. From the world to Brazil."[http://www.giselebundchen.com/novidades/10084/from-brazil-to-the-world "From Brazil to the World"] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120301034736/http://www.giselebundchen.com/novidades/10084/from-brazil-to-the-world |date=1 March 2012 }} News, 27 February 2012, Gisele web site In April 2012, ''Time'' listed her on their All-TIME 100 Fashion Icons list of the 100 most influential fashion icons since 1923.{{cite news |url=http://www.time.com/time/specials/packages/article/0,28804,2110513_2110628,00.html |title=All-TIME 100 Fashion Icons – Gisele Bündchen |author=Katy Steinmetz |date=2 April 2012 |work=Time |accessdate=2 April 2012}} In August 2012, in honor of the 120th anniversary of ''Vogue'', the magazine spotlighted the ten women who had most featured on the cover of the magazine, Bündchen being on the list with 11 covers total.{{cite web|url=http://www.vogue.com/magazine/article/fashions-familiar-faces-the-women-who-have-most-often-graced-the-cover-of-vogue/#1|title=Fashion's Familiar Faces: The Women Who Have Most Often Graced the Cover of Vogue|publisher=Vogue|date=|accessdate=19 December 2012|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20121219140203/http://www.vogue.com/magazine/article/fashions-familiar-faces-the-women-who-have-most-often-graced-the-cover-of-vogue/#1|archivedate=19 December 2012|df=dmy-all}} As of 2011, there had been [[List of Vogue cover models|29 persons]] to have appeared on the covers of ''Vogue Paris'', ''Vogue Italia'', American ''Vogue'' and British ''Vogue''; Bündchen being one of them. [[File:FIFA World Cup 2014 Final - Gisele Bündchen.jpg|thumb|right|upright=0.75|180px|Bündchen in 2014]] In 2012, she declined an invitation of the Brazilian Olympic Committee, the COB, to participate in the closing show alongside other national stars such as [[Marisa Monte]] and [[Seu Jorge]].{{cite web|url=http://extra.globo.com/famosos/gisele-bundchen-recusa-convite-do-cob-de-participar-do-encerramento-da-olimpiadas-de-londres-5062628.html|title=Gisele Bündchen recusa convite do COB de participar do encerramento da Olimpíadas de Londres - Famosos - Extra Online |language= pt |publisher=Extra.globo.com |date=8 February 2011 |accessdate=7 January 2013}} In 2012, she made 5,600 appearances in commercials in her native Brazil.{{cite web|url=http://revistaquem.globo.com/QUEM-News/noticia/2012/12/camila-pitanga-supera-gianecchini-e-neymar-em-campanhas-publicitarias.html|title=Camila Pitanga supera Gianecchini e Neymar em campanhas publicitárias | Quem - Notícias em QUEM News |publisher=Revistaquem.globo.com |date=27 December 2012 |accessdate=7 January 2013}} In August 2012, it was reported that she had replaced Kate Moss as the face of [[David Yurman]]. She was shot by famous photographer [[Peter Lindbergh]] for the fall 2012 campaign.{{cite news |url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/08/26/kate-moss-david-yurman-gisele-bundchen-2012_n_1831200.html |title=Kate Moss Reportedly Replaced By Gisele Bundchen As The Face Of David Yurman |publisher=The Huffington Post |date=26 August 2012 |accessdate=4 February 2013 |first=Rebecca |last=Adams}} As of the end of 2012, she had appeared on 120 ''Vogue'' covers. She also holds the record for the most Brazilian ''Vogue'' covers of all time.{{cite web |url=http://forums.thefashionspot.com/showpost.php?p=9297073&postcount=50 |title=the Fashion Spot - View Single Post - Models and the number of their Vogue covers |publisher=Forums.thefashionspot.com |date=23 June 2011 |accessdate=7 January 2013}} In February 2013, it was announced that she had become the face of Chanel's new make-up range, Les Beiges, a campaign which was shot by Mario Testino. This was her first time as a spokesperson of the brand.{{cite web |url=http://fashiongonerogue.com/gisele-bundchen-lands-first-chanel-campaign-with-les-beiges-collection/ |title=GISELE BUNDCHEN LANDS FIRST CHANEL CAMPAIGN WITH "LES BEIGES" COLLECTION |publisher=FashionGoneRogue |date=4 February 2013 |accessdate=4 February 2013}} For the brand's spring/summer 2014 campaign, Marc Jacobs chose Bündchen along with [[Catherine Deneuve]], [[Sofia Coppola]], [[Fan Bingbing]], Caroline de Maigret and [[Edie Campbell]] as his muses for his last collection for Louis Vuitton.{{cite web |url=http://www.wwd.com/media-news/fashion-memopad/portrait-of-a-lady-7319938|title=Louis Vuitton Campaign a Tribute to Marc Jacobs' Muses|date=19 December 2013}} In December 2013, Bündchen was announced as Pantene North America's newest ambassador.{{cite web |url=http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20131227005266/en/Gisele-B%C3%BCndchen-Sizzles-Pantene%E2%80%99s-Newest-Ambassador#.Ur4176go7GV|title=Gisele Bündchen Sizzles as Pantene’s Newest Ambassador}} In 2014, Bündchen and [[French people|French]] music producer and DJ [[Bob Sinclar]] recorded a cover version of [[Blondie (band)|Blondie]]'s 1979 classic "[[Heart of Glass (song)|Heart of Glass]]" for [[H&M]].{{cite web|url= http://video.repubblica.it/spettacoli-e-cultura/gisele-regina-dance-per-bob-sinclar-canta-in-bikini-animalier/163445/161935 |title= Gisele, regina dance per Bob Sinclar: canta in bikini animalier |publisher= [[Repubblica Radio TV|Repubblica TV]] |date= 22 April 2014 |accessdate= 12 July 2014|language=it}} She was credited by her mononym Gisele. The new version turned out to be an international hit charting in a great number of European singles charts including France, Germany, Spain, Austria and Belgium. The song was Bündchen's charity single for the H&M 2014 campaign.{{cite news|first= Olivia |last= Bergin |title= Gisele Bundchen to release charity single for H&M campaign |url= http://fashion.telegraph.co.uk/article/TMG10282629/Gisele-Bundchen-to-release-charity-single-for-HandM-campaign.html |newspaper= [[The Daily Telegraph|The Telegraph]] |date= 3 September 2013 |accessdate= 12 July 2014 |location=London}} A year earlier, she released a cover version of [[the Kinks]] "[[All Day and All of the Night]]" as her contribution to H&M 2013 charity campaign. [[File:Gisele Bündchen - Rio 2016 cropped (square).jpg|thumb|upright=0.75|230px|Bündchen at the [[2016 Summer Olympics opening ceremony|opening ceremony]] of the [[2016 Summer Olympics]] in [[Rio de Janeiro]]]] In May 2014, Bündchen was chosen as the new spokeswoman for the iconic fragrance [[Chanel No. 5]]. She was chosen for her "natural beauty and modern femininity", according to the company.{{cite web |url=http://www.wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/baz-and-gisele-take-five-7692136|title=Baz Luhrmann and Gisele Bündchen Take Five}} By June, Bündchen had appeared on 17 different international editions of ''[[Elle (magazine)|Elle]]'' over the preceding three months, including the Brazilian, German, Italian, Canadian, Japanese and Chinese editions.{{cite news|url=http://fashion.telegraph.co.uk/article/TMG10922406/Gis-Elle-Bundchens-17-cover-marathon.html |title=Gis-Elle Bundchen's 17 cover marathon |author=Olivia Lidbury |work=telegraph.co.uk |accessdate=30 August 2015 |date=24 June 2014 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140627023228/http://fashion.telegraph.co.uk/article/TMG10922406/Gis-Elle-Bundchens-17-cover-marathon.html |archivedate=27 June 2014 |df= }} In September 2014, the Baltimore-based company Under Armour signed Bündchen to a multiyear deal as the latest addition to its list of female endorsers.{{cite news|url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/2014-09-02/under-armour-signs-model-gisele-bundchen-in-push-to-entice-women.html|title=Under Armour Signs Model Gisele in Push to Entice Women|author=Matt Townsend|work=Bloomberg.com|accessdate=29 March 2015|date=2 September 2014}} In October 2014, Bündchen stated that she practices [[Transcendental Meditation technique|Transcendental Meditation]].{{cite web|title=Espie o que os famosos fazem quando o assunto é beleza e bem-estar |url=http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:evtifM4SryYJ:https://br.mulher.yahoo.com/fotos/espie-o-que-os-famosos-fazem-quando-o-assunto-%25C3%25A9-beleza-slideshow/&client=opera&hl=en&gl=uk&strip=0 |website=Yahoo! Brasil |accessdate=10 October 2014 |date=8 October 2014 |quote=Gisele Bündchen disse o que faz para manter a boa forma: meditação. 'Normalmente, faço a Meditação Transcedental, que é mais fácil de encaixar numa rotina agitada. É uma técnica simples, praticada duas vezes ao dia, durante 20 minutos.' }}{{dead link|date=November 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}{{cite web|title=Brazilian supermodel Gisele Bündchen practices TM|url=http://tmhome.com/experiences/gisele-bundchen-practices-meditation-tm/|website=TMhome.com|accessdate=10 October 2014|date=10 October 2014|quote=In her interview with the Brazilian edition of ''Glamour'' magazine (August 2014) ... 'I practice Transcendental Meditation twice a day. Every morning and lunchtime or evening, for about 20 minutes.'}} By the end of 2014, Bündchen appeared in 6,013 television commercial spots in the course of one year in Brazil. More than any other Brazilian celebrity, even outranking Neymar who made 5,625 TV commercial spots.{{cite web|url=http://g1.globo.com/economia/midia-e-marketing/noticia/2014/12/gisele-bundchen-desbanca-neymar-em-ranking-de-aparicao-em-comercial.html|title=G1 - Gisele Bündchen desbanca Neymar em ranking de aparição em comercial|work=Midia e Marketing|accessdate=29 March 2015}} Bündchen was featured in the 2015 Guinness World Record book as the model who earns the most money each year.{{cite web|title=Gisele no Guiness [sic] Book como modelo mais bem paga do mundo|url=http://glamurama.uol.com.br/gisele-no-guiness-book-como-modelo-mais-bem-paga-do-mundo/|website=Glamura.uol.com.br|accessdate=8 January 2018}} Bündchen's $700 Taschen book released in celebration of her 20th year career sold out in one day, before hitting shelves.{{cite web|title=Gisele's $700 Book Sells Out|url=http://www.vogue.co.uk/news/2015/11/09/gisele-bundchen-taschen-book-700-sold-out|website=Vogue.co.uk|accessdate=8 January 2018}} In 2015, Bündchen again was the Brazilian celeb who appeared on the most TV commercials in Brazil, with 8527 commercial spots for brands such as; (Carolina Herrera, Colcci, P & G and Sky).{{cite web|title=Gisele Bündchen lidera ranking de famosos em comerciais de TV|url=http://g1.globo.com/economia/midia-e-marketing/noticia/2016/01/gisele-bundchen-lidera-ranking-de-famosos-em-comerciais-de-tv.html|website=G1.globo.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} As of 2015, in 20 years Bündchen has appeared in more than 550 ad campaigns, 2000 magazine covers, 3500 magazine editorials and 800 fashion shows.{{cite web|title=Runways - Gisele Bündchen|url=http://giselebundchen.com/highlights/desfiles/|website=Giselebundchen.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} Coming out of retirement,{{cite web| title=Gisele Bundchen At Rio Olympics: Her Appearance At The Opening Ceremony| url=http://hollywoodlife.com/2016/08/05/gisele-bundchen-rio-olympics-opening-ceremony-2016/|website=Hollywoodlife.comr|accessdate=8 January 2018}} her latest catwalk was performed on 5 August 2016 at the famed [[Maracanã Stadium]] at the [[2016 Summer Olympics opening ceremony|opening ceremony]] of the [[2016 Summer Olympics]] in [[Rio de Janeiro]].{{cite news | url=http://www.ew.com/article/2016/08/05/gisele-bundchen-olympics-opening-ceremony-rio | title=Gisele Bündchen dazzles at the Olympics Opening Ceremony in Rio | first=Breanne L. | last=Heldman | work=Entertainment Weekly | accessdate=5 August 2016 }}{{cite web|url=http://www.harpersbazaar.com/fashion/models/news/a16703/gisele-bundchen-rio-olympics-2016/|title=Gisele Bündchen to Walk the 2016 Olympics Opening Ceremony|date=18 July 2016|website=Harpersbazaar.com}} ==Reception== [[File:Gisele B edit.jpg|thumb|upright|Bündchen in 2004]] In September 2000, ''[[Newsweek]]'' drew attention to a craze for modeling in Brazil because of Bündchen's success: {{quote|''Capricho'', a glossy teen magazine, recently asked 1,100 Brazilian teenagers if they wanted to become fashion models. Eighty-six percent said yes. The reason for this craze stands 1.77 meters tall and has smoldering blue eyes. Her name is Gisele Bundchen—known to all as Gisele—and she is the most celebrated Brazilian since Pele. First introduced by designer Alexander McQueen two years ago, Gisele, now 20, is the world's top cover girl, taking to more than 1,600 catwalks and earning a reported $7,000 an hour. When she struts her trademark runway walk—sassy and high-stepping, like a filly in tall grass—hearts beat faster from Milan to Manhattan. She has become an international icon: ''Vogue'' put the Brazilian bombshell on its cover three times last year and in December crowned her "Model of the Year."{{cite web|title=This Year's Model|url=http://www.newsweek.com/years-model-159397|website=Newsweek.com|accessdate=1 November 2014|date=25 September 2000}}}} Bündchen pioneered the "horse walk", a stomping movement created when a model picks her knees up high and kicks her feet out in front. As of 2014, she is listed by ''Forbes'' as the 89th most powerful woman in the world.{{cite news|title=The World's 100 Most Powerful Women|url=https://www.forbes.com/power-women/list/2/#tab:overall|website=Forbes.com|accessdate=26 June 2014}} Bündchen is the No. 2 biggest Brazilian celebrity of 2015 according to Forbes Brasil, based on media presence and overall influence in Brazil.{{cite web|title=This Year's Model|url=https://www.forbes.com.br/listas/2015/11/25-maiores-celebridades-do-brasil-em-2015/#foto1|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170320015943/http://www.forbes.com.br/listas/2015/11/25-maiores-celebridades-do-brasil-em-2015/#foto1|archivedate=20 March 2017|df=dmy-all}} ==Public image== [[File:Gisele Bundchen3.jpg|thumb|upright=0.75|right|Bündchen in 2006]] In 2000, Bündchen was dubbed the "Boobs from Brazil" for inspiring the 36,000 breast enhancement surgeries performed that year in Brazil.[http://www.people.com/people/gisele_bundchen "Celebrity Central / Top 25 Celebs"]. ''People'' In 2006, ''[[Elle (magazine)|Elle]]'' surveyed the American leading stylists and asked them to name the star whose hair was a favourite for their clients. More than 50 percent gave Bündchen the title of best hair in Hollywood.{{cite web|title=Gisele Bundchen – Gisele Tops Elle Hair Poll|url=http://www.contactmusic.com/news.nsf/article/gisele%20tops%20elle%20hair%20poll_1004086 |publisher=Contactmusic.com |accessdate=3 June 2011}} In February 2008, a survey by the International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery (ISAPS) asked the question, "What influences do celebrities have on the decisions patients make"? The survey was sent to more than 20,000 plastic surgeons in 84 countries. Bündchen was among the most frequently mentioned celebrities. Bündchen won the abdomen and hair categories and placed second in the breasts category.{{cite web|url=http://www.isaps.org/uploads/news_pdf/MELB-PR-Celebrity.pdf |title=Celebrity Influences on Plastic Surgery |format=PDF |accessdate=22 June 2009 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20090612101906/http://www.isaps.org/uploads/news_pdf/MELB-PR-Celebrity.pdf |archivedate=12 June 2009 }} In 2008, a black-and-white photo of Bündchen, shot by [[Irving Penn]], auctioned for $193,000 (£96,000). Bündchen's fetched by far the most on the night.{{cite web |url=http://www.vogue.co.uk/person/gisele-bundchen |title=Gisele Bundchen |publisher=Vogue.co.uk |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} She was second on ''[[Vanity Fair (magazine)|Vanity Fair]]''{{'}}s World's Most Beautiful poll in 2009.{{cite web |url=http://www.vanityfair.com/online/daily/2009/04/angelina-jolie-is-the-most-beautiful-woman-in-the-world |title=Angelina Jolie Is the Most Beautiful Woman in the World|accessdate=27 December 2012}} In January 2011, Bündchen came in first in the ''most desired female body'' on the ''14th Annual Famed Hottest Looks'' survey, compiled by Beverly Hills plastic surgeons Richard Fleming and Toby Mayer. Even after giving birth in December 2009, her body was the most requested by the doctors' patients. "Different body types are represented on the list because most women are shaped differently and want to look naturally beautiful," explained Dr. Fleming. "Some women want the lean look like Gisele [...]."{{cite news |url=http://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/2011/01/06/gisele-bundchen-mark-wahlberg-plastic-surgery-celeb-bodies/ |publisher=Fox News |title=EXCLUSIVE: 14th Annual America's Most Wanted Celebrity Body Parts |date=6 January 2011}} In 2011, [[AskMen.com]] revealed their annual "Most Desirable Women" list. Bündchen, along with [[Angelina Jolie]] and [[Beyoncé Knowles|Beyoncé]], are the only women to have made the list every year for 10 years in a row.{{cite web |url=http://www.imnotobsessed.com/2011/02/01/askmen-99-most-desirable-women-blake-lively-mila-kunis-sofia-vergara-angelina-jolie-gisele-beyonc/ |title=Who's the Most Desirable Actress in Hollywood? |publisher=Imnotobsessed.com |date=19 September 2011 |accessdate=24 December 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://archive.is/20130126113338/http://www.imnotobsessed.com/2011/02/01/askmen-99-most-desirable-women-blake-lively-mila-kunis-sofia-vergara-angelina-jolie-gisele-beyonc/ |archivedate=26 January 2013 |df=dmy-all }} Beyoncé in a 2011 Harper's Bazaar interview named Bündchen as one of her fashion inspirations stating that "I always admire [[Victoria Beckham]] and Gisele [Bündchen]. Their style is modern but always classic."{{cite web |last=Lipsky |first=Elisa |url=http://www.harpersbazaar.com/magazine/cover/beyonces-baby-love-interview-1111 |title=Beyonce Pregnant Interview - Beyonce Talks About Having a Baby|publisher=Harpersbazaar.com |date=11 October 2011 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} A designer from the Tibi Spring/Summer 2012 fashion show at New York Fashion week in fall 2011 explained, "The inspiration is taken heavily from the '90s—a freshly scrubbed Gisele from the pages of Vogue—clean, crisp, sporty looks and relaxed styles you want to live in."[http://www.blackbookmag.com/article/amy-smilovic-elin-kling-on-styling-tibis-ss12-runway/26953 "Gisele Bündchen Closes Out Givenchy's All-Star Show"] 3 October 2011, New York Fashion. ''Vogue'' editor [[Anna Wintour]] called her the "model of the millennium," and the magazine called her "The return of the sexy model". ''[[Rolling Stone]]'' declared her "The Most Beautiful Girl in the World" in 2000 and ''[[Vanity Fair (magazine)|Vanity Fair]]'' published an article titled "... And God Created Gisele" in 2009. In 2012, the 26th edition of Casa Cor in Brazil, one of the world´s biggest decorating, landscaping, and architecture events, paid tribute to Bündchen with a wood sculpture in her image.{{cite web|url=http://www.giselebundchen.com/.../casa-cor-pays-tribute-to-gisele |title=Gisele Bündchen - Site Oficial |publisher=Giselebundchen.com |date= |accessdate=24 December 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130628120405/http://www.giselebundchen.com/.../casa-cor-pays-tribute-to-gisele |archivedate=28 June 2013 |df= }} She was ranked No. 9 on ''[[Men's Health (magazine)|Men's Health Magazine]]''{{'}}s list of The Hottest Women of 2013.{{cite web|url=http://www.menshealth.com/sex-women/hottest-women-2013 |title=The Hottest Women of 2013 | Men's Health |publisher=Menshealth.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013}} In 2013 ''[[GQ|GQ Magazine]]'' listed her among The 100 Hottest Women of the 21st Century.{{cite web |url=https://www.gq.com/women/photos/201302/sexiest-women-21st-century-gq-february-2013 |title=GQ's 100 Hottest Women of the 21st Century: Photos |publisher=GQ |date= |accessdate=19 January 2013}} Bündchen is ranked No. 4, behind [[Pelé]], [[Paulo Coelho]] and [[Neymar]], on ''Forbes Brasil''{{'}}s list of the 100 most influential Brazilian celebrities.{{cite web |title=FORBES Brasil traz as 100 celebridades mais influentes do país em 2013|url=http://forbesbrasil.br.msn.com/blog/post-redacao.aspx?post=daaec777-6984-41d0-b444-2f2d194d4ed5#scpshrtu |accessdate=20 March 2014}} In May 2014, Bündchen was ranked No. 89 on ''Forbes''{{'}} 100 Most Powerful Women in the world list from the success of her various brands. She was the only model on the list.{{cite web|title=The World's Most Powerful Women 2014 - Forbes|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/carolinehoward/2014/05/28/the-worlds-most-powerful-women-2014/}} In November 2014, Bündchen was ranked No. 5 by ''Forbes Brasil'', as the 25 biggest celebrities in Brasil in 2014.{{cite web|title=25 maiores celebridades do Brasil em 2014 - Forbes Brasil |url=http://www.forbesbrasil.co/listas/15-maiores-celebridades-do-brasil-em-2014/ |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141204193653/http://www.forbesbrasil.co/listas/15-maiores-celebridades-do-brasil-em-2014/ |archivedate=4 December 2014 |df= }} After Super Bowl 49, Rails LA shirt Bündchen wore sold out in two days and Stuart Weitzman boots she wore saw an increase in sales.{{cite web|title=Gisele Bündchen Bedazzles Her Patriots Jersey—Plus, Her Post-Victory Plaid Shirt Is Sold Out!|url=http://www.eonline.com/news/620823/gisele-bundchen-bedazzles-her-patriots-jersey-plus-her-post-victory-plaid-shirt-is-sold-out/}}{{cite web|title=Stuart Weitzman's Susan Duffy, The Image Innovator - Daily Front Row|url=http://fashionweekdaily.com/stuart-weitzmans-susan-duffy-image-innovator/}} Based on media presence and overall influence, Bündchen ranked No. 2 biggest Brazilian celeb in 2015, according to Forbes Brasil.{{cite web|title=RANKING: 25 maiores celebridades do Brasil em 2015 - Forbes Brasil|url=https://www.forbes.com.br/listas/2015/11/25-maiores-celebridades-do-brasil-em-2015/#foto1/|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170320015943/http://www.forbes.com.br/listas/2015/11/25-maiores-celebridades-do-brasil-em-2015/#foto1/|archivedate=20 March 2017|df=dmy-all}} ==Criticism== In November 2002, Bündchen was paid a reported £320,000 and given two black mink coats by American fur company [[Blackglama]] to head its new advertising campaign. Activists from [[PETA]] (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals), invaded the runway during the Victoria's Secret show in New York and brandished placards saying "Gisele: fur scum". The Brazilian was one of the most prominent models to wear fur since it began to come back into acceptability in fashion circles. A PETA spokesperson said: "By getting into bed with the fur-pushers, Gisele has become PETA enemy number one. Every time that Gisele or anyone else wears furs they are sentencing countless animals to a violent and cruel death."{{cite web|url=https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/northamerica/usa/1413381/Gisele-left-exposed-on-catwalk-by-fur-protest.html|title=Gisele left exposed on catwalk by fur protest|publisher=[[The Sunday Telegraph]]|date=16 November 2002|accessdate=13 January 2016}} In August 2010, she was criticized after saying that breastfeeding should be law. She told ''[[Harper's Bazaar|Harper's Bazaar UK]]'', "Some people here [in the U.S.] think they don't have to breastfeed, and I think 'Are you going to give chemical food to your child when they are so little?'...I think there should be a worldwide law, in my opinion, that mothers should breastfeed their babies for six months."{{cite web|url=https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/celebritynews/7927001/Gisele-Bundchen-forced-to-apologise-over-breastfeeding-comments.html|title=Gisele Bundchen forced to apologise over breastfeeding comments|publisher=[[The Sunday Telegraph]]|date=4 August 2010|accessdate=13 January 2016}} Bündchen later posted a statement on her blog saying, "My intention in making a comment about the importance of breastfeeding has nothing to do with the law. It comes from my passionate beliefs about children. Being a new mom has brought a lot of questions. I feel like I am in a constant search for answers on what might be the best for my child. It's unfortunate that in an interview sometimes things can seem so black and white."{{cite web|title=If Only All Moms Could Breastfeed Like Gisele|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/12/10/gisele-breastfeeding-instagram_n_4421101.html}} In February 2011, she infuriated cancer experts when she said of sunscreen: "I cannot put this poison on my skin...I do not use anything synthetic." The statement was made as she launched her own organic skin care line Sejaa.{{cite web|title=Gisele: Sunscreen Is 'Poison'|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/02/04/gisele-sunscreen-poison_n_818704.html|publisher=[[Huffington Post]]|date=4 February 2011|accessdate=13 January 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-1353581/Gisele-Bundchen-angers-cancer-experts-saying-sun-cream-poison.html|title=It's poison: Gisele Bundchen angers cancer experts by saying people shouldn't wear sun lotion|publisher=[[Daily Mail]]|date=4 February 2011|accessdate=13 January 2016}} Bündchen has made advertising for [[Nivea|Nivea Sun]] in the past.{{cite web|url=https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newsvideo/celebrity-news-video/8301406/Gisele-Bundchens-Nivea-Sun-commercial.html|title=Gisele Bundchen's Nivea Sun commercial|publisher=[[The Daily Telegraph]]|date=3 February 2011|accessdate=13 January 2016}} Bündchen's publicist Amber Clapp added, telling StyleList: "Gisele would never say not to use sunscreen because she has had family members who have had skin cancer. She simply stated that her all-natural skin-care line does not have SPF because there is not an all natural SPF available....When using sunscreens, she selects ones that are free of parabens, oxybenzone, PABA and retinyl palmitate."{{cite web|title=Gisele Clarifies Sunscreen Comments|url=http://www.mindbodygreen.com/0-1976/Gisele-Clarifies-Sunscreen-Comments.html}} In April 2011, Ted Southern, former designer of [[Victoria's Secret]] Angels' wings, revealed that Gisele was difficult to work with; "She's really tough," he said. "She's always screaming, 'What the f--k is this?'"{{cite web|url=http://fashion.telegraph.co.uk/news-features/TMG8433946/Gisele-Bundchen-is-no-angel.html|title=Gisele Bündchen is no 'angel'|work=Telegraph|date=7 April 2011|accessdate=16 November 2016}} In September 2011, a lingerie TV ad starring Bündchen in Brazil, was deemed "offensive and sexist" by the Brazilian government department for policies for women, which called for the ad to be banned, saying in a statement that the campaign "reinforce the wrong stereotypes of the woman as a husband's mere sex object and ignore the great advances we've achieved in deconstructing sexist thoughts and practices." The secretariat petitioned the National Council for Advertising Self-Regulation (known by its Portuguese acronym CONAR), to open an investigation into whether the campaign was sexist, and CONAR accepted the request.{{cite web|url=http://content.time.com/time/world/article/0,8599,2096771,00.html|title=Gisele's Sexist TV Ad? Brazilian Government Targets Spot|work=TIME|date=12 October 2011|accessdate=16 November 2016}} In the ads, titled "Hope teaches", the model gives her husband bad news such as "honey, I've crashed the car" or "honey, I've reached the credit card limit … both mine and yours" – first fully dressed (which they teach viewers is wrong), then wearing tiny lingerie (which, according to ''Hope'', is right). Women were taught to use their charm and sexy lingerie to control their husbands in the ads.{{cite web|url=https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2011/sep/30/gisele-bundchen-sexist-lingerie-ads-brazil|title=Gisele's sexist lingerie ads are no laughing matter in Brazil|work=Telegraph|date=30 September 2011|accessdate=16 November 2016}} In February 2012, after the Patriots lost in [[Super Bowl XLVI]] and Bündchen was heckled by several [[New York Giants]] fans, she was caught on video saying, "My husband cannot fucking throw the ball and catch the ball at the same time!"{{cite news|title=Video of Super Bowl XLVI comment|url=http://www.nypost.com/video?vcid=23569919&freewheel=90861&sitesection=nypostns |date = 5 February 2012 |work=New York Post|accessdate =10 February 2012}}{{cite news|url = http://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/gisele-bundchen-tells-tom-brady-played-best-game-life-slamming-patriots-article-1.1018579?localLinksEnabled=false | title = Super Bowl XLVI comment | date = 7 February 2012 |work=Daily News |location=New York | accessdate =10 February 2012}} The comment, which was widely publicized both in the traditional media{{cite web|url=http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2012/02/gisele-bundchen-curses-tom-bradys-super-bowl-loss/ |title=Gisele Bundchen Curses Tom Brady's Super Bowl Loss |publisher=Abcnews.go.com |date=6 February 2012 |accessdate=24 December 2012}}[http://articles.nydailynews.com/2012-02-06/news/31031995_1_patriots-locker-room-tom-brady-ball "Gisele Bundchen slams Patriots receivers?"] ''Daily News'' (New York). 6 February 2012. Retrieved 8 March 2012. and the blogosphere,{{cite news|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/02/06/tom-brady-gisele-bundchen-patriots-giants-super-bowl_n_1256477.html |title=Tom Brady's Wife, Gisele Bundchen, Curses After Patriots Fall To Giants In Super Bowl (VIDEO, PHOTOS) |publisher=Huffingtonpost.com |date= 6 February 2012|accessdate=7 January 2013 |first=Michael |last=Klopman}}{{cite news |last=Evans |first=Thayer |url=http://fifthdown.blogs.nytimes.com/tag/gisele-bundchen/ |title=GISELE BUNDCHEN – The Fifth Down Blog |publisher=Fifthdown.blogs.nytimes.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013}} caused a media stir.{{cite news |author=Guy Trebay |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2012/02/19/fashion/new-york-fashion-week-diary.html?_r=1&scp=1&sq=Gisele%20curse&st=cse |title=Tinseltown in New York |publisher=The New York Times |accessdate=14 February 2013 |date=17 February 2012}} In November 2012, Bündchen was criticized by doctors and mothers after making a post in her website claiming that hospital birth is "violence against women and babies". The post was quickly removed from her website.{{cite web|url=http://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/2012/11/27/post-on-gisele-website-calling-hospital-births-violence-against-women-and/|title=Post on Gisele's website calling hospital births 'violence' against women and babies sparks criticism|work=Fox News|date=27 November 2012|accessdate=14 June 2017}}{{cite web|url=http://www.foxnews.com/health/2012/11/27/dr-manny-giseles-website-calling-hospital-births-violent-is-slap-in-face.html|title=Dr. Manny: Gisele’s website calling hospital births ‘violent’ is a slap in the face|work=Fox News|date=27 November 2012|accessdate=14 June 2017}}{{cite web|url=http://thestir.cafemom.com/celebrity_moms/147175/home_birth_fanatic_gisele_bundchen|title=Home Birth Fanatic Gisele Bundchen Ignites War on Hospital Births|work=Cafe Mom|date=27 November 2012|accessdate=14 June 2017}}{{cite web|url=http://www.skepticalob.com/2012/11/no-gisele-natural-childbirth-promotes-violence.html|title=No, Gisele, natural childbirth promotes violence|work=The Skeptical OB|date=27 November 2012|accessdate=14 June 2017}} In January 2014, the model was criticized after being photographed in Costa Rica riding an [[All-terrain vehicle|ATV]] while carrying her 13-month-old daughter Vivian in one arm and without helmet.{{cite web |url=http://www.bostonmagazine.com/arts-entertainment/blog/2014/01/14/gisele-bundchen-carries-baby-riding-four-wheeler-costa-rica/|title=Gisele Bundchen Takes Baby on Four-Wheeler with No Helmets|publisher=Boston Magazine|date=14 January 2014 |accessdate=14 June 2017}} She was slammed for what many called "dangerous behavior". People were outraged that she would disregard the safety of her child by taking her on an ATV ride.{{cite web|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/2014/08/14/gisele-photographed-riding-quad-bike-with-one-hand-while-carrying-baby-vivian_n_7335732.html|title=Gisele Photographed Riding Quad Bike With One Hand While Carrying Baby Vivian|work=Huffington Post|date=14 August 2014|accessdate=}}{{cite web |url=http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-moms/news/gisele-bundchen-rides-atv-in-bikini-with-13-month-old-daughter-vivian-forgoes-helmets-pictures-2014141|title=Gisele Bundchen Rides ATV in Bikini With Baby Vivian Without Helmet|publisher=[[Us Weekly]]|date=14 January 2014 |accessdate=14 June 2017}} This was the second time Bündchen was caught with her baby daughter on an ATV. On 13 March 2013, when Vivian was just 3 months old, she was photographed doing the same thing. Bündchen was not wearing a helmet in either incident, and it is illegal in Costa Rica to ride an ATV on public land without one.{{cite web |url=http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-moms/news/gisele-wears-tiny-string-bikini-with-daughter-vivian-lake-in-baby-bjorn-rides-atv-with-baby-on-board-2013193|title=Gisele Wears Tiny String Bikini With Daughter Vivian Lake in Baby Carrier, Rides ATV With Baby on Board|publisher=[[US Weekly]]|date=19 March 2013 |accessdate=14 June 2017}} In July 2015, Bündchen was accused of mocking [[Islam]] and faced backlash after being photographed wearing a [[burqa]] while visiting a plastic surgery clinic in Paris.{{cite web|url=http://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2015/jul/30/gisele-bundchen-accused-of-mocking-islam-with-burq/|title=Gisele Bundchen accused of mocking Islam with burqa disguise in France|work=Washington 'boob job' by wearing a burqa|work=news.com.au|date=3 August 2015|accessdate=14 June 2017}} ==Endorsements== [[File:Gisele Bundchen5.jpg|thumb|upright=0.75|Bündchen in 2006]] After [[C&A]] Brazil |url=https://www.forbes.com/finance/lists/53/2002/LIR.jhtml?passListId=53&passYear=2002&passListType=Person&uniqueId=2VPP&datatype=Person |title=Forbes Celebrity Top 100 2002 |work=Forbes |deadurl=yes Reporter |date=21 August 2012 |accessdate=7 January 2013 |first=Elizabeth |last=Snead}} In 2001, Bündchen launched Ipanema Gisele Bündchen,{{cite web|title=Ipanema Gisele Bündchen |url=http://www.ipanema.uk.com/producthome/Women/Gisele_Bundchen |work=Ipanema |publisher=Ipanema |accessdate=12 April 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130426080239/http://www.ipanema.uk.com/producthome/Women/Gisele_Bundchen |archivedate=26 April 2013 |df= }} her own line of flip-flop sandals in association with the official [[Ipanema (brand)|Ipanema]] brand of flip-flops. In three years, sales topped $30 million, with a portion of proceeds going to green causes. ''Forbes'' put her 53rd on their 2007 list of the most powerful celebrities.{{cite news |title=#53 Gisele Bundchen |url=https://www.forbes.com/lists/2007/53/07celebrities_Gisele-Bundchen_2VPP.html |work=Forbes |date=14 June 2007 |accessdate=20 September 2012}} Ipanema Gisele Bündchen made an estimated [[£]]152 million with over 250 million pairs sold in 2010.{{cite web |url=http://www.vogue.co.uk/news/2011/06/02/gisele-soon-to-be-a-billionaire |title=Gisele The Billionaire |date=2 June 2011 |last=Alexander |first=Ella |accessdate=18 August 2011}} Bündchen told ''Vitals'' magazine in 2005 that she has been involved in business and investing in real estate since she was 18 years old. She has said modeling is only 40 per cent of what she does, the rest being contracting.{{cite web |url=http://imcmagazine.com/browser.php?person=Gisele%20Bundchen |title=» Gisele Bundchen Fansite – Pictures, Biography, & News [IMC] |publisher=Imcmagazine.com |accessdate=22 January 2012}} On 1 May 2007, it was announced that Bündchen had ended her contract with Victoria's Secret.{{cite web|last=Triggs |first=Charlotte |url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20037350,00.html |title=Gisele Bündchen, Victoria's Secret Part Ways |work=People |date=1 May 2007 |accessdate=3 June 2011}} According to a stock market analysis in 2007, when Bündchen terminated her agreement with Victoria's Secret, which is owned by [[L Brands|Limited Brands]], Limited was selling for $26.80 per share. Soon thereafter, the stock declined to $18.36 per share, a 31.5% drop.{{cite web |url=http://stockerblog.blogspot.com/2007/12/gisele-bundchen-stock-index-update.html |title=Stockerblog - The Stock Market Blog: Gisele Bundchen Stock Index Update |publisher=Stockerblog.blogspot.com |date=21 December 2007 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} American economist Fred Fuld developed a stock index to measure the profit performance improvement of companies represented by Bündchen compared with the [[Dow Jones Industrial Average]]. According to Fuld, the ''Gisele Bündchen Stock Index'' was up 15 per cent between May and July 2007, substantially surpassing the Dow Jones Industrial Average, which was up just 8.2%.[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Htt9vPvdO5w Índice Gisele Bündchen]. Revistapublicidad.com. Retrieved 28 October 2011. {{cbignore|bot=medic}} In 2010, Bündchen introduced her own [[Cosmetics|skin care]] [[Product lining|product line]], named Sejaa Pure Skincare, which according to ''Forbes'' had been in talks with Shiseido for over a year on an acquisition deal.[http://www.sejaa.com/ Our Founder] Sejaa web site{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/profile/gisele-bundchen/ |title=Gisele Bundchen |publisher=Forbes |date=18 April 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In early 2011, Procter & Gamble's Pantene shampoo sales increased 40 per cent in Latin America after Bündchen started representing the product.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/2011/05/05/top-earning-models.html|title=The World's Top-Earning Models | work=Forbes | first1=Keren|last1=Blankfeld|first2=Steven|last2=Bertoni|date=5 May 2011}} [[Edward Razek]], chief marketing officer of Limited Brands, who worked with Bündchen during her Victoria's Secret career says, "She's an international icon who can also move product, from shampoo to couture."{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/2011/05/05/top-earning-models.html?partner=relatedstoriesbox|title=The World's Top-Earning Models|last=and Steven Bertoni|first=Keren Blankfeld|date=5 May 2011|work=Forbes|accessdate=11 May 2011}}{{cite web|url=http://seekingalpha.com/article/266380-procter-gamble-s-ceo-discusses-q3-2011-results-earnings-call-transcript |title=Procter & Gamble's CEO Discusses Q3 2011 Results – Earnings Call Transcript |publisher=Seeking Alpha |date=28 April 2011 |accessdate=3 June 2011}} The lingerie brand HOPE increased turnover by 40 percent after contracting Bündchen as its representative.[http://www1.folha.uol.com.br/mercado/945981-marca-de-lingerie-de-gisele-duplica-procura-por-franquias-hope.shtml "Marca de lingerie de Gisele duplica procura por franquias Hope"] 20 July 2011, ''Brasil em Folhas'' (in Portuguese). According to Grazia daily UK in January 2012, her lingerie label "Gisele Bundchen Brazilian Intimates", has already proved to be a sell out in Latin America, Portugal, Japan, and Israel.{{cite web|url=http://www.graziadaily.co.uk/fashion/archive/2012/01/25/kerchiiiiing-gisele-bundchen-set-to-become-first-billionaire-model.htm |title=Gisele Set To Become First Billionaire Model | Grazia Fashion |publisher=Graziadaily.co.uk |date=25 January 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In February 2012, the website Vogue.it stated "the Brazilian model is the King Midas of fashion. Everything she touches turns to gold and companies that have invested in her have reaped the rewards."{{cite web|author=vogue.it |url=http://www.vogue.it/en/people-are-talking-about/obsession-of-the-day/2012/02/gisele-bundchen-forbes |title=Gisele the Millionaire |publisher=Vogue.it |date=22 November 2011 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} An Esprit public awareness campaign featuring Bündchen helped raise consumer awareness of the Esprit brand, with a 9 percent rise in Germany, and a 19 percent rise in China.[https://web.archive.org/web/20120321163229/http://svesty.com/index.php/fashion-news/113-gisele-bundchen-for-the-esprit-spring-summer-2012-collection 'Gisele Bundchen For The Esprit Spring Summer 2012 Collection"] 15 March 2012, Svesty Fashion She was ranked No. 61 on ''Forbes''{{'}} Most Powerful Celebrities list in 2012.[https://www.forbes.com/sites/dorothypomerantz/2012/05/16/jennifer-lopez-tops-celebrity-100-list/ "J.Lo's Stunning Career Reincarnation Puts Her No. 1 On The Celebrity 100"] 16 May 2012, Forbes. In May 2012 she was ranked fourth on the World's Most Powerful Latino Celebrity list by ''Forbes''.{{cite news|author=Anderson Antunes |url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/andersonantunes/2012/05/25/the-worlds-most-powerful-latino-celebrities/2/ |title=The Worlds Most Powerful Latino Celebrities |publisher=Forbes.com |date=18 April 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In 2013 she ranked No. 5 on the most successful Brazilian Business Women list. The products that bear her name in Brazil include Grendene's Ipanema sandals. She has her own lingerie line called Gisele Bundchen Intimates. She still collects big fees to lend her image for the likes of Chanel, David Yurman and P&G.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/pictures/eifl45ekgd/no-5-gisele-bundchen/|title=The 10 Most Powerful Businesswomen In Brazil|accessdate=5 June 2013 | work=Forbes|first=Anderson|last=Antunes}} The brand of products for teeth Oral B Brasil grew considerably since hiring Bündchen. She earns $4 million a year from her Procter & Gamble contract.{{cite web|url=http://glamurama.uol.com.br/mais-um-contrato-mundial-para-gisele-bundchen-engordar-o-cofrinho/|title=Mais um contrato mundial para Gisele Bündchen engordar o cofrinho…}} Bündchen's jelly sandals Ipanema by Gisele Bundchen sell as much as 25 million pairs annually and accounted for more than 60% of Grendene’s annual exports of about $250 million in 2013.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/andersonantunes/2014/01/10/brazils-newest-billionaire-has-gisele-to-thank-as-he-joins-forbes-list-of-the-worlds-richest//|title=Brazils newest billionaire has Giselle to thank as he joins Forbes list of the worlds richest |accessdate=15 February 2014 | first=Anderson|last=Antunes}} In February 2014, it was documented that the Gisele Bundchen stock index was still outperforming the Dow industrial average, up by 93%.{{cite news|url=http://stockerblog.blogspot.com/2014/02/gisele-bundchen-stock-index-up-93.html|title=Gisele Bündchen Stock Index Up 93%|date=13 February 2014}} In May 2015, Brazilian magazine Istoe Gente reported that Bündchen's line of INtimates, Gisele Bundchen INtimates has been lucrative. "As of May 2015 especially in e-commerce, it was recorded to have an increase of 181% in one year. We went from 30,000 visitors per month to 100,000," says Vanda Dias, e-commerce manager for Hope, which manages the top brand.{{cite news|url=http://www.istoe.com.br/reportagens/417362_OLHA+ELA+AI+|title=Olha ela aí...|date=15 May 2015|language=Portuguese|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150518084317/http://www.istoe.com.br/reportagens/417362_OLHA+ELA+AI+|archivedate=18 May 2015|df=dmy-all}} In 2016, Bündchen signed with Braziian shoe company Arezzo. According to fashion website glamurama, Bündchen made shares of Arezzo go up on the São Paulo Stock Exchange.{{cite news|title=Gisele faz ações da Arezzo subirem na Bolsa de Valores de São Paulo|url=http://glamurama.uol.com.br/gisele-faz-acoes-da-arezzo-subirem-na-bolsa-de-valores-de-sao-paulo/|website=Glamura.uol.com.br|accessdate=8 January 2018}} In 2016, CEO of Under Armour Kevin Plank mentioned that the company's women's brand was the number one selling category with ecommerce, and that's growing more rapidly than either men's or the youth category. A large part of this growth was by using what Plank called "personalities" — namely star ballerina Misty Copeland and Bündchen.{{cite news|title=Under Armour is using Gisele for an aggressive expansion plan — and it should terrify Lululemon|url=http://www.businessinsider.com/under-armour-womens-business-could-beat-lululemon-2016-1|website=businessinsider.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} ==Philanthropy== ===Charitable activities=== [[File:Gisele Bündchen 2006.jpg|thumb|upright=0.75|right|Bündchen in 2006]] Bündchen donated $150,000 to Brazil's [[Fome Zero|Zero Hunger program]]. She designed a limited necklace edition for ''[[Harper's Bazaar]]'', crafted by jewelers Gumuchian Fils. These necklaces were sold to raise money for [[St. Jude Children's Research Hospital]]. She contributed an autographed iPod loaded with a personal playlist to be auctioned off, with all proceeds benefiting [[Music Rising]], a campaign founded in 2005 to replace lost or destroyed instruments of musicians in the Gulf Coast Region after [[Hurricane Katrina|hurricane disasters]].{{cite web|url=http://www.looktothestars.org/celebrity/gisele-bundchen/news |title=Page 1 of 1 for Gisele Bundchen Charity News |publisher=Looktothestars.org |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In 2006, Bündchen became the face of American Express Red, part of the [[Product Red]] initiative. A portion of earnings from this credit card are donated to HIV/AIDS victims in Africa.{{cite web|url=http://www.chinadaily.com.cn/lifestyle/2006-09/01/content_679601.htm |title=China Daily – Lifestyle |work=China Daily |date=1 September 2006 |accessdate=3 June 2011}} In 2009, she appeared on 30 covers of the international issues of ''[[Elle (magazine)|Elle]]'' wearing Product Red clothing and
