url=http://www.boston.com/ae/celebrity/more_names/blog/2011/03/gisele_bundchen_supports_earth.html?comments=all#readerComm | work=Boston Globe | first=M | last=Shanahan | title=Gisele Bundchen supports earthquake relief; Brady sells New York pad | date=18 March 2011 }} Bündchen opened The Luz Foundation in 2007, a grant-making organization advocating the empowerment of young girls. She donates a percentage of her earnings to help with their projects.{{cite web|url=http://www.renunciadesign.com/theluzfound.html |title=:: Liat Anan :: Graphic Design :: |publisher=Renunciadesign.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120225123640/http://www.renunciadesign.com/theluzfound.html |archivedate=25 February 2012 |df= }} In 2008 Bündchen auctioned a collection of diamonds for charity. The collection featured a 6-carat diamond ring worth $120,000 – $150,000, and a 3.35-carat Sabbadini diamond ring worth $15,000 – $20,000. A percentage of the proceeds from the auction went to Russell Simmons' Diamond Empowerment Fund, whose mission is to raise money to support education initiatives in countries where diamonds are a natural resource.{{cite web|url=http://www.looktothestars.org/news/1249-gisele-bundchen-auctions-diamonds-for-empowerment-fund |title=Gisele Bundchen Auctions Diamonds For Empowerment Fund |publisher=Looktothestars.org |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In 2010 she wrote a $1.5 million check to the [[Red Cross]] to aid the relief effort in [[Haiti]] after seeing the devastation done by the earthquake.{{cite news|last=Meredith Goldstein|first=Mark Shanahan|title=Gisele gives $1.5m to Haiti relief effort|url=http://www.boston.com/ae/celebrity/articles/2010/01/15/gisele_gives_15m_to_haiti_relief_effort/|accessdate=20 December 2012|newspaper=The Boston Globe|date=15 January 2010}} Bündchen made a surprise visit to patients at [[Jimmy Fund]] Clinic at the [[Dana–Farber Cancer Institute]] in Boston.{{cite web|url=http://www1.whdh.com/news/articles/local/boston/12005840530748/supermodel-makes-surprise-visit-to-cancer-patients/ |title=Supermodel makes surprise visit to cancer patients |publisher=.whdh.com |date= |accessdate=24 December 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130630105931/http://www1.whdh.com/news/articles/local/boston/12005840530748/supermodel-makes-surprise-visit-to-cancer-patients/ |archivedate=30 June 2013 |df= }} In 2011, Bündchen was added to The Giving Back Fund's list of celebs who made the largest donations to charity.[http://www.givingback.org/Programs_Services/GivingBack30_2011.html 2011 Giving Back 30 Released in Parade Magazine & Parade.com] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120215132647/http://www.givingback.org/Programs_Services/GivingBack30_2011.html |date=15 February 2012 }} Giving Back.org In June 2012, she helped launch a beauty contest in Brazil, Top Kufa Brazil, to find new faces in Brazilian [[favelas]]. This was the first national competition of beauty played exclusively by candidates between 18 and 22 years who live in underserved communities, created by the Central Union of Slums and Pantene, the brand which Bündchen is the face of.{{cite web|url=http://colunas.revistaepoca.globo.com/brunoastuto/2012/05/29/gisele-bundchen-descobrira-new-faces-nas-favelas/ |title=Gisele Bündchen descobrirá new faces nas favelas brasileiras – Bruno Astuto – Época |publisher=Colunas.revistaepoca.globo.com |date=29 May 2012 |accessdate=7 January 2013}} Bündchen ranked No. 15 on ''Forbes''{{'}}s 30 most generous celebrities list in 2012.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/andersonantunes/2012/01/11/the-30-most-generous-celebrities/2/ | work=Forbes | first=Anderson | last=Antunes|title=The 30 Most Generous Celebrities}} On 26 December 2013, Bündchen surprised Karina Moreira, a local Boston teen at her home, who is battling bone cancer. Before then, they had met once, two years ago at a Dana Farber event. Moreira and Bündchen talked about fashion and shared makeup tips.{{cite web|url=http://ktla.com/2013/12/29/supermodel-gisele-bundchen-surprises-teenage-cancer-patient/#ixzz2qJ5OO8eH|title=Supermodel Gisele Bundchen Surprises Teenage Cancer Patient|website=Ktla.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} As of April 2014, Bündchen is one of 22 designers to design a collection for the charity Born Free Africa, an exclusive collaboration from Shopbop, ''Vogue'', and 22 designers. 100% of the profits from this women's and children's collection will go toward Born Free's mission to end mother-to-child HIV transmission at birth.{{cite web|url=http://www.shopbop.com/ci/4/lp/born-free.html#boutique#cs=ov=3062295201,os=81,link=DIMHBornFree-04232014%7Ctitle=Shopbop|title=HIV Campaign|website=Shopbop.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} ===Environmental work=== [[File:Gisele Bundchen6.jpg|thumb|upright=0.75|Bündchen in 2006]] Bündchen dedicates part of her website to environmental issues. She launched a "green" blog in 2008 with the aim of "reflecting on socio-environmental issues that we can do something about". In May 2009, she co-hosted the [[Rainforest Alliance]]'s annual gala to honor leaders in sustainability.[https://web.archive.org/web/20111223155449/http://www.unep.org/gwa/ambassadors/gisele/] Bündchen has also supported a variety of environmental causes, including clean water initiatives, [[Sustainability|environmental sustainability]], and preservation of South American [[rainforest]]s.{{cite web|url=http://www.odebate.com.br/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=9912&Itemid=11 |title=Gisele Bündchen ajuda a reflorestar a Mata Atlântica |publisher=Odebate.com.br |accessdate=3 June 2011}} In 2007 she took part in eBay Giving Works, [[eBay]]'s program dedicated to charity listings online auction for the [[World Wide Fund for Nature|WWF]], with 100% of the proceeds going to the World Wildlife Fund's global conservation initiatives, especially those involved in the fight against climate change.{{cite web|url=http://www.looktothestars.org/news/381-celebrity-auctions-tackle-the-big-issues |title=Celebrity Auctions Tackle The Big Issues |publisher=Looktothestars.org |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In 2008 she appeared on the cover of US magazine ''American Photo'' to promote her Forests of the Future project for the reforestation of the Brazilian [[Atlantic Forest]]. The initiative, which was set up with [[SOS Mata Atlântica Foundation|SOS Mata Atlantica]] in 2004, has planted over 1 million new trees in Bündchen's name to start reforestation of the Brazilian rainforests.{{cite web|url=http://www.looktothestars.org/news/1453-gisele-bundchen-goes-au-naturel-for-rainforests |title=Gisele Bundchen Goes Au Naturel For Rainforests |publisher=Looktothestars.org |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In May 2011 Bündchen was named Harvard's 2011 [[Global Environmental Citizen Award|Global Environmental Citizen]] in recognition of her eco-efforts.{{cite web|last=Zalopany |first=Chelsea |url=http://www.vogue.com/voguepedia/Eco_Fashion |title=Eco Fashion – Voguepedia |publisher=Vogue.com |date= |accessdate=7 January 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20121223174633/http://www.vogue.com/voguepedia/Eco_Fashion |archivedate=23 December 2012 |df= }} In November 2011, she was awarded Greenest Celebrity at the 2011 International Green awards at the National History Museum of London. Each year the Green Awards honors a celebrity who has been the most creative and innovative in the approach of sustainability of the environment. An online public vote took place and Bündchen was the winner, beating Paul McCartney and Miguel Bose.{{cite web|author=Angie Tarantino |url=http://www.theenvironmentalblog.org/2011/12/super-model-gisele-bundchen-greenest-celebrity-award/ |title=Super model Gisele Bundchen wins greenest celebrity award |publisher=Theenvironmentalblog.org |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140512223332/http://www.theenvironmentalblog.org/2011/12/super-model-gisele-bundchen-greenest-celebrity-award/ |archivedate=12 May 2014}} In 2016, she joined the climate change documentary show [[Years of Living Dangerously]] as one of its celebrity correspondents.{{cite web|url=https://www.boston.com/culture/celebs/2016/06/02/gisele-shows-us-shes-earth-goddess-busy-saving-planet |title=Gisele will appear on National Geographic’s ‘Years of Living Dangerously’ |publisher=boston.com |accessdate=17 June 2016}} ===Goodwill ambassador=== In 2008 Bündchen and Brady dished out turkey and all the trimmings unannounced to over 400 job trainees in Roxbury Massachusetts for Goodwill Industries International.{{cite web|url=http://www.looktothestars.org/news/1646-gisele-bundchen-spreads-thanksgiving-goodwill |title=Gisele Bundchen Spreads Thanksgiving Goodwill |publisher=Looktothestars.org |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} On 20 September 2009, she was designated ''Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations Environment Programme'' (UNEP).{{cite web |url=http://www.unep.org/Documents.Multilingual/Default.asp?DocumentID=596&ArticleID=6315&l=en |title=Supermodel Gisele Bundchen becomes UN Environmental Ambassador |publisher=Unep.org |date=22 May 2007 |accessdate=3 June 2011 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=http://webarchive.loc.gov/all/20141010083051/http%3A//www.unep.org/Documents.Multilingual/Default.asp?DocumentID%3D596%26ArticleID%3D6315%26l%3Den |archivedate=10 October 2014 |df=dmy-all }} In January 2012, Bündchen made her first official visit to Africa as UNEP Goodwill Ambassador.[http://www.unep.org/newscentre/Default.aspx?DocumentID=2666&ArticleID=9004&l=en UNEP Goodwill Ambassador Gisele Bundchen Backs 'Small is Beautiful' Energy Solutions on First Mission to Africa] 13 January 2012, UNEP Bündchen chooses a different charity each year to which proceeds of sales from her sandals are donated. The 2011 donation went to ISA – the Socio-environmental Institute.{{cite web|url=http://www.ipanemaflipflops.co.uk/about.html |title=Ipanema Flip Flop |publisher=Ipanemaflipflops.co.uk |date= |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In January 2012, Bündchen visited Kenya on a goodwill mission to improve energy poverty. She spent a day with a family in a village in Kisumu County and helped them with tasks such as carrying firewood to their hut – while discussing the dangers of using firewood inside homes that do not have energy. She danced with the locals and visited various homes, as well as teaming up with UK NGO [[Practical Action]] during the course of her stay.{{cite web |url=http://celebrity-gossip.net/gisele-bundchen/gisele-bundchens-goodwill-visit-kenya-579109 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140315012728/http://celebrity-gossip.net/gisele-bundchen/gisele-bundchens-goodwill-visit-kenya-579109 |dead-url=yes |archive-date=15 March 2014 |title=Gisele Bundchen's Goodwill Visit to Kenya |publisher=Celebrity-gossip.net |date=23 January 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012 }}{{cite web |url=http://practicalaction.org/giseleinkenya |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120419081812/http://practicalaction.org/giseleinkenya |dead-url=yes |archive-date=19 April 2012 |title=Gisele Bündchen visits Practical Action's energy access projects in Kenya |publisher=Practicalaction.org |date= |accessdate=24 December 2012 }} In April 2012 she donated money for AIDS research.{{cite web|url=http://colunas.revistaepoca.globo.com/brunoastuto/2012/04/27/gisele-desfilara-de-lingerie-em-sao-paulo/ |title=Gisele desfilará de lingerie em São Paulo – Bruno Astuto – Época |publisher=Colunas.revistaepoca.globo.com |date=27 April 2012 |accessdate=22 November 2012}} On the eve of [[World Environment Day]] 4 June 2012, Bündchen, who is Goodwill Ambassador of the [[UNEP]] (United Nations Environment Programme), went to [[Rio de Janeiro]] to plant the first of a series of 50,000 trees in a degraded area.{{cite web |url=http://veja.abril.com.br/noticia/celebridades/gisele-bundchen-planta-arvore-no-rio-de-janeiro |title=Gisele Bündchen planta árvore no Rio de Janeiro |date=4 June 2012 |publisher=veja.abril.com.br |accessdate=7 June 2012}} In January 2014, Bündchen joined the [[Rainforest Alliance]] board of directors.{{cite web|url=http://www.rainforest-alliance.org/newsroom/news/gisele-bundchen-board-member |title=Gisele Bündchen Joins Rainforest Alliance Board of Directors |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140104062735/http://www.rainforest-alliance.org/newsroom/news/gisele-bundchen-board-member |archivedate=4 January 2014 |df= }} ==Personal life== [[File:Tom Brady 2011.JPG|thumb|upright|Bündchen married [[Tom Brady]] in 2009 and they have two children.]] From 1998 to 1999, Bündchen dated American model Scott Barnhill.{{cite web|url=http://www.ofuxico.com.br/noticias-sobre-famosos/matheus-mazzafera-abre-o-bau-e-encontra-foto-de-gisele-bundchen-com-ex-o-modelo-scott-barnhill/2010/05/24-70555.html|title=Matheus Mazzafera I've so much to do first'|publisher=telegraph.co.uk|date=7 September 2001|accessdate=25 January 2016}} In 2000, she had a brief relationship with American actor [[Josh Hartnett]].{{cite web|url=https://www.dgabc.com.br/(X(1)S(rz1patmvagzn5fbmtqjy0qej))/Noticia/416941/gisele-bundchen-estaria-saindo-com-ator-americano|title=Gisele Bündchen estaria saindo com ator americano|publisher=dgabc.com.br|language=Portuguese|date=27 March 2000|accessdate=25 January 2016}} From 2000 to 2005, Bündchen was in a relationship with American actor [[Leonardo DiCaprio]].{{cite web|author=Gisele Bündchen |url=http://www.people.com/people/gisele_bundchen/biography |title=Celebrity Central: Gisele Bundchen biography |work=People |accessdate=3 June 2011}} In 2004, Bündchen and DiCaprio made ''[[People (magazine)|People]]''{{'}}s annual Most Beautiful Couples List.{{cite web|url=http://www.people.com/people/gallery/0,,1046248_1051659_859203,00.html |title=Most Beautiful Couples |publisher=People.com |date=21 April 2005 |accessdate=11 January 2013}} Bündchen dated Brazilian businessman and [[Polo|polo player]] [[:pt:Ricardo Mansur Filho|Rico Mansur]] for six months between 2002 and 2003, after Bündchen and DiCaprio broke up for the first time.{{cite web|url=http://www.terra.com.br/istoegente/173/reportagens/gisele_bundchen_namoro.htm |title=ISTOÉ Gente - O eleito da Top|publisher=terra.com.br|language=Portuguese|date=25 November 2002|accessdate=25 January 2016}} In 2006, she dated American surfer [[Kelly Slater]].{{cite web|url=http://glamurama.uol.com.br/tempestade-6451/|title=Kelly Slater fala sobre a época em que namorou com Gisele|publisher=Glamurama|language=Portuguese|date=21 April 2005 |accessdate=11 January 2013}} She is a fan of [[Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense]], a club from her state of birth, [[Rio Grande do Sul]]. She brought her husband with her to Brazil to attend a [[Grenal|Grêmio–Internacional derby]] in 2018.{{Cite news|url=https://www.mg.superesportes.com.br/app/noticias/futebol/gremio/2018/05/12/noticia_gremio,472673/cinco-vezes-campeao-na-nfl-tom-brady-recebe-homenagem-do-gremio.shtml|title=Cinco vezes campeão na NFL, Tom Brady recebe homenagem do Grêmio|last=Superesportes|date=2018-05-12|work=Superesportes|access-date=2018-05-24|language=pt-BR}} ===Family=== Bündchen began dating [[New England Patriots]] quarterback [[Tom Brady]] in December 2006.{{cite web|url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20009620,00.html |title=Tom Brady & Gisele Bundchen: New Couple? |work=[[People (magazine)|People]] |accessdate=7 December 2012 |archivedate=6 September 2015 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150906073525/http://www.people.com/people/article/0%2C%2C20009620%2C00.html |deadurl=no |df= }} In 2009, Brady revealed they had been set up on a blind date by a mutual friend.{{cite news|url=http://www.details.com/celebrities-entertainment/cover-stars/200907/patriots-quarterback-tom-brady-on-football-fatherhood-and-gisele-bundchen?currentPage=4|title= Patriots Quarterback Tom Brady on Football, Fatherhood, and Gisele Bündchen|accessdate=27 April 2013| archiveurl = https://web.archive.org/web/20131002074606/http://www.details.com/celebrities-entertainment/cover-stars/200907/patriots-quarterback-tom-brady-on-football-fatherhood-and-gisele-bundchen?currentPage=4 | archivedate= 2 October 2013| deadurl=no }} Bündchen and Brady married on 26 February 2009 in a small Catholic ceremony at St. Monica Catholic Church in [[Santa Monica, California]].{{cite news|url=http://www.eonline.com/uberblog/b101983_its_true_tom_brady_gisele_buumlndchen.html|title=It's True. Tom Brady, Gisele Bündchen Secretly Wed|publisher=[[E!]]|date=27 March 2009|accessdate=12 September 2010|first=Natalie|last=Finn | archiveurl =https://web.archive.org/web/20110402182635/http://www.eonline.com/uberblog/b101983_its_true_tom_brady_gisele_buumlndchen.html | archivedate=2 April 2011}} In April 2009, the couple held a second marriage ceremony, in Costa Rica.{{cite web|url=http://www.upi.com/Entertainment_News/2015/02/27/Gisele-Bundchen-shares-wedding-photo-with-Tom-Brady/1441425056291/| title=Gisele Bundchen shares wedding photo with Tom Brady: The model and NFL star married in two separate ceremonies in 2009 | first=Annie |last=Martin |agency =[[UPI]] | date=27 February 2015|accessdate=8 September 2015| archivedate= 10 March 2015 | archiveurl = https://web.archive.org/web/20150310113524/http://www.upi.com/Entertainment_News/2015/02/27/Gisele-Bundchen-shares-wedding-photo-with-Tom-Brady/1441425056291/ | deadurl=no}} Bündchen and Brady have two children, a son born in 2009{{cite web|url=http://celebrity-babies.com/2009/12/18/gisele-bundchen-and-tom-brady-name-son-benjamin/ |title=Gisele Bündchen and Tom Brady Name Son Benjamin| work= People| date= 18 December 2009 |accessdate=3 June 2011 | archiveurl = https://web.archive.org/web/20100310151554/http://celebrity-babies.com/2009/12/18/gisele-bundchen-and-tom-brady-name-son-benjamin/ | archivedate=10 March 2010}}{{cite web|url=http://www.vogue.com/feature/2010_April_Gisele_Bundchen/|title=Gisele Bündchen Talks to Vogue's Joan Juliet Buck on Having a Baby, Tom Brady and Sejaa|work=Vogue|accessdate=15 March 2010|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://www.webcitation.org/6CjPGQeJw?url=http://www.vogue.com/magazine/|archivedate=7 December 2012|df=dmy-all}} and a daughter born in 2012.{{cite web|url=http://celebritybabies.people.com/2012/12/07/tom-brady-gisele-bundchen-welcome-daughter-vivian-lake/|title=Gisele Bündchen and Tom Brady Welcome Daughter Vivian Lake|work=People|date=7 archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150905100845/http://celebritybabies.people.com/2012/12/07/tom-brady-gisele-bundchen-welcome-daughter-vivian-lake/ | deadurl=no}} She is also stepmother to Brady's first son from his previous relationship with actress [[Bridget Moynahan]], whom Brady had split with in December 2006.{{cite web|url=http://people.com/celebrity/bridget-moynahan-thankful-for-healthy-baby/|title=Bridget Moynahan 'Thankful' for Healthy Baby|website=People.com|accessdate=18 January 2018}} In 2010, Bündchen told ''[[Harper's Bazaar]]'' how important breastfeeding is for her.{{cite news | url = https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/celebritynews/7922407/Supermodel-Gisele-Bundchen-breastfeeding-should-be-made-law.html|title=Supermodel Gisele Bündchen: breastfeeding should be made law|date=2 August 2010|accessdate=20 January 2010|location=London|work=The Daily Telegraph}}{{cite web|url=http://www.wcvb.com/money/first-look-bradybundchen-brookline-megamansion/28002438|title=First look: Brady-Bundchen Brookline mega-mansion|date=29 March 2015|work=WCVB|accessdate=29 March 2015}} Bündchen and her family eat primarily a plant-based diet.{{cite web|url=http://people.com/babies/gisele-bundchen-kids-eat-plant-based-diet/|title=Gisele Bündchen Says Her Kids Eat a (Mostly!) Plant-Based Diet: It's 'Good for Our Health' and 'the Planet'|website=People.com|accessdate=8 January 2018}} Bündchen and Brady's Los Angeles home uses [[solar energy]], a [[gray water]] system, lighting systems that reduce energy consumption, a rainwater recovery system, and waste reduction and recycling programs. The house uses recovered stone, wood, insulation, household appliances with a green seal and other sustainable products, and 80% of the construction waste was reused or recycled.{{cite web|url=http://blog.giselebundchen.com.br/en/planeta/retrospectiva-verde-3/ |title=Green Retrospective |deadurl=yes |accessdate=27 January 2013 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120820094723/http://blog.giselebundchen.com.br/en/planeta/retrospectiva-verde-3/ |archivedate=20 August 2012 |df= }}{{Self-published inline|date=May 2017}} Subsequently, the family bought a $14 million condominium at [[One Madison]] in [[Manhattan]] in October 2013. They are building another mansion near [[Boston]].{{cite web|url=http://www.contactmusic.com/story/gisele-bundchen-and-tom-brady-buy-14m-nyc-apartment_3921922|title=Gisele Bundchen - Gisele Bundchen and Tom Brady buy $14M NYC apartment|publisher=Contactmusic.com|date=25 October 2013|accessdate= 27 October 2013}} ===Wealth=== [[Forbes]] estimated Bündchen's 2016 income at $30.5 million.{{cite web |url=https://www.forbes.com/profile/gisele-bundchen/ |title=Gisele Bündchen |year=2016 |accessdate=16 February 2017 }} In August 2011, Bündchen ranked 60th on the ''[[Forbes]]'' list of The World's 100 Most Powerful Women.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/profile/gisele-bundchen |title=Profile |publisher=Forbes.com |date=18 April 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} She ranked third on The 20 Youngest Power Women of 2011 List at age 31.{{cite news|author=Jenna Goudreau |url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/jennagoudreau/2011/08/24/youngest-forbes-power-women-lady-gaga-beyonce-gisele-bundchen/ |title=The 20 Youngest Power Women of 2011 |publisher=Forbes.com |date=18 April 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In 2011 ''Forbes'' named Bündchen and Brady as the World's Highest Paid Celebrity couple, beating [[Brad Pitt]] and [[Angelina Jolie]] as well as [[Beyoncé Knowles|Beyoncé]] and [[Jay-Z]].{{cite news|last=Antunes|first=Anderson|title=The World's Highest-Paid Celebrity Couples|url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/andersonantunes/2011/08/19/the-worlds-highest-paid-celebrity-couples/|publisher=Forbes.com LLC|accessdate=13 December 2011}} In August 2012 she was one of four people in the fashion industry and the only model to be ranked on the ''Forbes'' list of "The World's Most Powerful Women" at No. 83. She ranked in the top 10 of the ''Forbes'' list of "Entertainment's Highest-Paid Women" in 2012, at No. 8.{{cite news|author=Dorothy Pomerantz |url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/dorothypomerantz/2012/10/01/oprah-tops-our-list-of-hollywoods-highest-paid-women-but-her-reign-may-soon-end/ |title=Oprah Tops Our List Of Entertainment's Highest-Paid Women, But Her Reign May Soon End |publisher=Forbes |date=18 April 2012 |accessdate=19 December 2012}} In July 2007 ''Forbes'' named her the world's top-earning model.{{cite news |url=https://www.forbes.com/media/2007/07/19/models-media-bundchen-biz-media-cz_kb_0716topmodels.html |work=Forbes| title=The World's Top-Earning Models | date=16 July 2007|accessdate=20 April 2013 |first=Kiri |last=Blakeley}} By 2008, she continued to dominate the ''Forbes'' list of the world's highest-earning models, and appeared on the magazine's list of the Top 20 Richest Women in Entertainment. During 2009–2010, she was the top earning supermodel.{{cite web|last=Bertoni |first=Steven |url=http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/37133492/?GT1=43001 |title="Gisele is again highest paid model in the world". MSN report, January 2010 |publisher=MSNBC |date=13 May 2010 |accessdate=3 June 2011}} In 2010, she retained the top spot as Forbes's highest-earning model. In May 2011, ''Forbes'' ranked her as the world's top-earning model for the fifth consecutive time. Her earnings climbed over the previous year, thanks to an economic boom in Brazil, coupled with a 10 per cent surge in the value of the [[Brazilian real]] against the dollar. Also in 2013 she ranked No. 3 on the 16 most successful female entrepreneurs list by ''Forbes''.{{cite news|url=https://www.forbes.com/pictures/lml45effkg/gisele-bundchen-founder-sejaa-skincare/|title=The World's Most Powerful Female Entrepreneurs|accessdate=5 June 2013 | work=Forbes|first=Meghan|last=Casserly}} Bündchen, however, disputes the number, telling ''[[WSJ.]]'' magazine in November 2013, "Who are they speaking to when they come up with these numbers? Not my accountant, that's for sure."{{cite news|url=https://www.wsj.com/news/articles/SB10001424052702303376904579135712399293816 |title=Gisele Bündchen's Model Life | work=The Wall Street Journal | first=Derek |last=Blasberg |date=7 November 2013}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Film |- !
